news.title: Terahertz spectroscopy could power bomb-detection technology
news.summary: BOSTON, May 20 (UPI) -- Researchers at MIT and Princeton have built a new laser-powered terahertz spectroscopy system capable of detecting chemicals used in explosives.

news.title: Terahertz spectroscopy could power bomb-detection technology
news.summary: SIGN UP FOR OUR NEWSLETTER BOSTON, May 20 (UPI) — Researchers at MIT and Princeton have built a new laser-powered terahertz spectroscopy system capable of detecting chemicals used in explosives.
